ygData.subject: Re: Maxima and Hydras
ygData.msgSnippet: She felt rather odd with that question. Perhaps. A friend... a comrade. She does follow orders rather well. That is all I can say about her. brief pause, I

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

She felt rather odd with that question. "Perhaps. A friend... a comrade. She 
does follow orders rather well. That is all I can say about her." brief pause, 
"I will bring Blackstorm back as soon as we have had out rendezvous with the 
crashed Decepticons." 

She hadn't really pondered the idea of her being anyone's friend. It was 
usually a comrade or fellow warrior. They all had a duty to perform & did it. 

Internally, she picked up a weak signal that was actually not too far away. 
"The group of crashed Decepticons are not that far. Once I have them, we shall 
return immediately to base."  

After a moment's thought on the last couple words, she smiled & tried to 
contain her excitement. "Until then?" She purred as she smiled, her optics gazing 
off in the direction of the weak Decepticon signal. 

--part1_1d6.a646040.2c060471_boundary
